content.body:
### Shop 225/50R18 Tire Size The 225/50R18 tire size is more common on older vehicles, but can still be found on newer rides like the Honda Odyssey, Mazda6 and BMW 3 Series as well as cars and crossovers like the Dodge Grand Caravan, Chevrolet Malibu and Honda CR-V. Most drivers of these vehicles can do fine with all-season tires; they’re the best-selling category of tires in the United States thanks to their balance of good handling, low road noise, a comfortable ride and year-round traction even in light snow. If you’re looking for a set of premium 225/50R18 all-season tires for your vehicle, we’d refer you to tires like the Michelin Premier A/S, [Yokohama Advan Sport A/S](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-sport-a-s-plus), Toyo Extensa HP II, and Kumho Solus TA71. Popular vehicles: 2020-2021 Honda Odyssey
2012-2021 Mazda6
2013-2019 BMW 3 Series
2007-2012 Dodge Grand Caravan
2006-2012 Chevrolet Malibu
1995-2006 Honda CR-V Maybe you're the kind of driver who likes to push the envelope a little with some crisp cornering and steering response. Ultra-high-performance all-season tires allow drivers to bring out the sportier side of their ride year-round, so check out tires like the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Pirelli P Zero All Season Plus, and BFGoodrich g-Force COMP-2 A/S+, and Hankook Ventus S1 Noble2 (H452) if you drive a BMW or other sports car and want sporty handling in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Where you live, do you often see harsh winters with subfreezing temperatures and lots of snow that stays on the ground for weeks? You should probably consider dedicated winter tires. Winter tires offer ride quality, noise levels and handling that rival the best touring tires, but with a more aggressive tread and a rubber compound that stays pliable in cold weather. They can dig into snow and slush when all season tires can’t get the job done; we’d suggest tires like the Michelin X-Ice Xi3, Nokian Hakkapeliitta 9, Firestone Winterforce 2, or [General Altimax Arctic 12](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/altimax-arctic-12). Just remember to change out your winter tires when the thermometer is above about 40 degrees Fahrenheit, as their tread formulation wears quickly in warmer weather. Whether you drive a BMW 3 Series, Honda Odyssey, Mazda6, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/50R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
